name: 林士欽
objective:
刑法是規定犯罪與刑罰之法律，例如「殺人」是犯罪，「處死刑、無期徒刑或 10 年以上有期徒刑」是刑罰。刑法總則是規定各種犯罪與刑罰之共通原理，例如故意或過失。刑法分則是規定各種不同的犯罪與刑罰，例如（故意）殺人或過失致死。透過刑法分則課程之修習，希望使同學能夠認識刑法常見而重要的犯罪類型之規定。
Criminal law is a law that stipulates crime and punishment. For example, "homicide" is a crime, and "punishment for death, life imprisonment or more than 10 years in prison" is a punishment. The general rule of criminal law is to stipulate the common principles of various crimes and penalties, such as intentional or negligent. The criminal law is to stipulate various crimes and penalties, such as (intentional) murder or negligence. Through the training of the Criminal Law Sub-Course, I hope that students can understand the provisions of the common and important types of crimes in criminal law.
